name: The Rebirth of Nature
description:
The Rebirth of Nature is lowpoly 2D a shooter game with heavy rogue-like elements.

In  future, there is a city that robots living in. There is no need oxygen except the boss of the city. He is a half human-half robot and he needs oxygen. Oxygen resource is in the heart of the city, with some tree in a bell glass. Our character Treelo made a mistake by escaping the glass and its friends died because of it. Treelo is the last oxygen resource for the boss now, and he need Treelo alive. Treelo must battle against the robots which try to catch it for the boss. 

WASD keys are for movement

Left Mouse click enable to shoot.

 F key works for heal potion.

G key works for mana potion. 

Space key for shield.

Game Design/Development: Hakan Burak Karaman

3D Artist/Sound Design: Aycan Karataş

Development: Hakan Burak Karaman
